# weforum

[![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

Interface to the [World Economic Forum's](https://www.weforum.org/) website [API](https://api.weforum.org/).

## Functions

* `wef_list`
* `wef_articles`

## Examples

```{r}
library(weforum)

(list <- wef_list())

articles <- wef_articles()
```
